1.title: Counting Sheep
1.hover: On the bright side, I'm a survivor of over 9,000 sheep.

2.title: Hipster Deer
2.hover: No one understands just how profound my way of listening to music is.

4.title: Candysaurus
4.hover: Even at 18, I'm not too old to dream...

5.title: Caterpillars
5.hover: If I could categorize this catastrophe, I'd call it quite cataclysmic...

6.title: Sunset
6.hover: I never know how to respond to compliments.

8.title: Balloon
8.hover: Ahh well, I heard those clouds were bullies anyways.

9.title: Aim for the Moon
9.hover: It's pretty lonely on the moon anyways I guess.

11.title: Fred
11.hover: Ahh, Fred, you're always so happy, and I don't know how you do it.

13.title: All of My Friends
13.hover: We are the 99.9% of bacteria your hand sanitizer killed.

14.title: Character
14.hover: Only my cat can judge me.

15.title: Transcendence
15.hover: I am certain that every great philosopher who has ever lived also pooped.

16.title: Rapunzel
16.hover: I may not be a damsel in distress, but I hope you'd be noble enough to shave me anyways.

17.title: Lovebirds
17.hover: There are plenty of fish in the sea, but none of them can fly.

18.title: All My Wildest Dreams
18.hover: They say happiness is all about the feeling of being in control of your life... I hope you've mastered lucid dreaming!

19.title: Imagination
19.hover: Shush that logic; yes, I learned to eat by imagination too... three times a day.

20.title: Better
20.hover: I'm also the most humble person here by far.

21.title: Cancer
21.hover: It's ironic what disease she spent her life researching...

23.title: The Pie
23.hover: Now those kids of mine better not be eating my apples.

24.title: Squirrel
24.hover: Call me nutty, but I've been trying to cashew fur tree years.

25.title: Walking Towards You
25.hover: And we shall be united for all eternity.

26.title: The Clouds
26.hover: This place feels strangely familiar to me.

27.title: The Bunny Who Hated Carrots
27.hover: I bet you're the kind of racist who thinks mice like cheese.

28.title: True Wonder
28.hover: "The most beautiful experience we can have is the mysterious. It is the fundamental emotion which stands at the cradle of true art and true science. Whoever does not know it and can no longer wonder, no longer marvel, is as good as dead, and his eyes are dimmed." -- Albert Einstein

30.title: Wishing on a Star
30.hover: "I want my kids to grow feathers and fly."
